Improve color resolution with proper CSS cascade logic
description: Currently resolveVariableColor uses 'last wins' logic. Should use the same cascade sorting as hover provider: !important > specificity > source order. This requires passing context (usage location) through to the resolution.

title: Store valueRange in CssVariable interface for accurate color picker positioning
description: Currently, color picker positioning uses indexOf to find values within declarations, which is fragile for edge cases like '--red: red'. We should store the valueRange (just the value part) in the CssVariable interface during parsing with csstree, similar to how we store the declaration range.
